sentences.english: Tore his old wings off with a sigh.
sentences.chinese: 叹息着他撕下自己古老的鲜血淋淋的翅膀。

sentences.english: As I got closer, I could make out a woman's bloody torso.
sentences.chinese: 走近后，我辨认出一个女人血淋淋的躯干。

sentences.english: His bloody throat had been cut so deeply that he was nearly decapitated.
sentences.chinese: 他的喉咙血淋淋的，刀口很深，几乎都要被斩首了。

sentences.english: Part the of the allure of subversive art like this is the shock value. Why would a lovable character be welding a bloody knife?
sentences.chinese: 为什么一个娇滴滴的形象要变成拿着把血淋淋的刀？

sentences.english: His head, anyway. All blood and his eyes half gouged.
sentences.chinese: 那颗人头血淋淋的，眼睛被抠出来了。

sentences.english: Police rushed to the home and found her cleaning up the bloody scene.
sentences.chinese: 警方冲进她的家里，发现她正在清洗血淋淋的现场。

sentences.english: Behind a silver horse the blood corpse of a naked man bounced and dragged.
sentences.chinese: 银马拖着一具血淋淋的赤裸男尸，在崎岖的地面弹跳。

sentences.english: Sharing gory details is totally unfair to the poor people around you.
sentences.chinese: 让身边的可怜人“分享”血淋淋的细节实在不公。

sentences.english: Bigan's heart was dug out by King of Zhou, which was a bloody case.
sentences.chinese: 比干被纣王以剖心之刑处死，就是一个血淋淋的例子。

sentences.english: In a kidney bowl lies the bloodied slug that was his foreskin.
sentences.chinese: 在小碗中放着切下来血淋淋的包皮。

sentences.english: It is a strong full-blooded fish.
sentences.chinese: 这是一条很健壮鲜血淋淋的鱼。

sentences.english: Eric Schenk and I worked out the gory details over the next few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 埃里克克，我制定了血淋淋的细节在未来几个星期。

definition: to be drenched with blood/dripping blood
lit. shocks the eye, astonishes the heart (idiom); shocking/horrible to see/a ghastly sight
to be badly mangled or mutilated (idiom)
lit. shocks the eye, astonishes the heart (idiom); shocking/horrible to see/a ghastly sight/also written 觸目驚心|触目惊心
flesh and blood flying (idiom); carnage/people blown to pieces
tears of blood (symbol of extreme suffering)/blood and tears
